ValidationRule.description: The Services Section is required in order for an SOW to be marked as "SOW Completed"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)>DATEVALUE("2016-07-19"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "SOW Completed"), OR( ISBLANK(Services_Amount__c), ISBLANK(Services_Amount_T_M__c), ISBLANK(Services_Hours_Fixed_Fee__c), ISBLANK(Services_Hours_T_M__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Services Section (Services Amount - Fixed Fee, Services Amount - T&M, Services Hours - Fixed Fee, and Services Hours - T&M) are required before an SOW can be marked as "SOW Completed"
